item.description:
http://euro.meetup.co...

The Assistant Organizer of EuroMeetup has offered an invitation for 10 of our members to join her event in Marblehead MA on June 20. Please see the link for all the details.

http://euro.meetup.co...

There are 10 spots for our group so sign up fast! Check the link for details and directions.

It sounds fun!

Reece

group.name: The Boston English as a Second Language Meetup Group

item.name: Invitation from EuroMeetup June 20 in Marblehead, MA
